Data Types¶

Basically JSON, but HTML and also XML, YAML and CSV are supported. Incoming HTTP data is decoded and outgoing data encoded. Special data type (de)serialisations are easy to add, e.g. for DateTime, see ???

JSON¶

Assumed as standard format.

XML¶

YAML¶
